casebody.data:
No. 11-399. Reynaldo Sorcia, aka Reynaldo Sorcia-Rico, Petitioner v. Eric H. Holder, Jr., Attorney General. 565 U.S. 1061, 132 S. Ct. 776,

181 L. Ed. 2d 487,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8660. November 28, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 643 F.3d 117.
